title: Yume de Aetara (If I See You in My Dreams)
synopsis: Yume de Aetara is a story about one guy Fuguno Masuo (a complete loser when it comes to relationship with women) and two girls: Shiozaki Nagisa and Hamaoka Miho. Since the story is pretty simple (and hilariously funny), further explanation will spoil everything (take the hint: watch it yourself!)
staff: [['Watanabe, Hiroshi', ['Director', ' Character Design']], ['Yoshinari, Kou', ['Key Animation']], ['Yamahana, Noriyuki', ['Original Creator']], ['Ooki, Ryouichi', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']]]
